caption: A person in an orange shirt was on a phone call. Soon after, a peculiar-looking man with a pointed nose returned home with three little girls. Inside the house lurked a fierce and large-mouthed monster. The man guided the girls on a tour through the house. Later, the man and a scientist watched a group of small figures dance. The girls ventured into the laboratory and activated some devices. Their intrusion was quickly discovered by the peculiar-looking man. Some yellow figures approached, and the peculiar man urged them to get back to work.
